1.message: A minor cut grazes the {defender}'s head.

2.message: A slash glances across the {defender}'s scalp.

3.message: A solid cut opens a gash on the {defender}'s face.

4.message: A deep slash strikes the {defender}'s head, staggering them.

5.message: A savage cut to the {defender}'s head sends them reeling.

6.message: A brutal slash caves in the {defender}'s skull. A fatal blow!

1.message: A minor cut on the {defender}'s right hand.

2.message: A sharp cut lands on the {defender}'s right knuckles.

3.message: A deep slash cuts across the {defender}'s right palm.

4.message: Strong slash to the {defender}'s right hand cuts deep.

5.message: A vicious slash severs tendons in the {defender}'s right hand!

6.message: The {defender}'s right hand is lopped off at the wrist!

1.message: A glancing blow bruises the {defender}'s head.

2.message: A solid blow rings the {defender}'s bell.

3.message: A heavy blow to the {defender}'s head sends them seeing stars.

4.message: A crushing blow splits the {defender}'s helm, staggering them.

5.message: A devastating blow caves in the {defender}'s head. A fatal blow!

1.message: A solid thump to the {defender}'s chest.

2.message: A heavy blow to the {defender}'s chest knocks the wind out of them.

3.message: A powerful blow cracks the {defender}'s ribs.

1.message: A small prick on the {defender}'s neck.

2.message: A sharp jab pierces the {defender}'s neck.

3.message: The blade sinks deep into the {defender}'s throat.

4.message: A mortal wound to the {defender}'s neck! Blood fountains forth.

1.message: A jolt of energy crackles across the {defender}'s scalp.

2.message: A surge of electricity zaps the {defender}'s head, stunning them.

3.message: A heavy jolt to the {defender}'s head cooks their eyes!

4.message: The {defender}'s head explodes in a shower of sparks. A fatal blow!

1.message: A minor jolt zaps the {defender}'s chest.

2.message: A strong shock courses through the {defender}'s torso, making them gasp.

3.message: A powerful surge stops the {defender}'s heart for a moment!

2.message: A heavy jolt to the abdomen causes skin to break open.

3.message: A powerful surge flashes through the {defender}, cooking their insides.

1.message: A glancing impact bruises the {defender}'s head.

2.message: A solid impact rings the {defender}'s bell.

3.message: A heavy impact to the {defender}'s head sends them seeing stars.

4.message: A concussive impact splits the {defender}'s helm, staggering them.

5.message: A devastating impact caves in the {defender}'s head. A fatal blow!

1.message: A solid thump to the {defender}'s chest.

2.message: A heavy impact to the {defender}'s chest knocks the wind out of them.

3.message: A powerful impact cracks the {defender}'s ribs.

head.2: minor lacerations about the head and a possible mild concussion
head.3: severe head trauma and bleeding from the ears

neck.3: snapped bones and serious bleeding from the neck

chest.1: minor cuts and bruises on your chest
chest.3: deep gashes and serious bleeding from your chest

abdomen.1: minor cuts and bruises on your abdominal area
abdomen.2: deep lacerations across your abdominal area
abdomen.3: deep gashes and serious bleeding from your abdominal area

back.1: minor cuts and bruises on your back
back.3: deep gashes and serious bleeding from your back

right_leg.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your right leg
right_leg.2: a fractured and bleeding right leg

left_leg.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your left leg
left_leg.2: a fractured and bleeding left leg

right_arm.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your right arm
right_arm.2: a fractured and bleeding right arm

left_arm.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your left arm
left_arm.2: a fractured and bleeding left arm

right_hand.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your right hand
right_hand.2: a fractured and bleeding right hand

left_hand.1: some minor cuts and bruises on your left hand
left_hand.2: a fractured and bleeding left hand

nervous_system.1: a strange case of muscle twitching

head.3: old mutilation wounds about your head

neck.3: terrible scars from some serious neck injury

chest.1: an old battle scar across your chest
chest.2: several painful-looking scars across your chest
chest.3: terrible, permanent mutilation of your chest muscles

abdomen.1: an old battle scar across your abdominal area
abdomen.2: several painful-looking scars across your abdominal area
abdomen.3: terrible, permanent mutilation of your abdominal muscles

back.1: an old battle scar across your back
back.2: several painful-looking scars across your back
back.3: terrible, permanent mutilation of your back muscles

right_eye.2: severe bruises and swelling around your right eye

left_eye.2: severe bruises and swelling around your left eye

right_leg.1: old battle scars on your right leg

left_leg.1: old battle scars on your left leg

right_arm.1: old battle scars on your right arm

left_arm.1: old battle scars on your left arm

right_hand.1: old battle scars on your right hand

left_hand.1: old battle scars on your left hand

nervous_system.3: a very difficult time with muscle control
